query:
ALTER TABLE erp_integration_configs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sync_interval INT DEFAULT 3600,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sync_direction VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'bidirectional',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS auth_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'api_key',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS credentials TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mapping_config TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_sync_at DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_sync_status VARCHAR(50);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute ALTER TABLE erp_integration_configs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sync_interval INT DEFAULT 3600,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sync_direction VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'bidirectional',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS auth_type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'api_key',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS credentials TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mapping_config TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_sync_at DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS last_sync_status VARCHAR(50);
